#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{

	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	
	string a,b;
	cin>>a>>b;
	vector<int> v1(26,0);
	vector<int> v2(26,0);
	int x=a.length(),y=b.length();
	for(int i=0;i<x;i++)
	v1[a[i]-'a']++;
	for(int i=0;i<y;i++)
	v2[b[i]-'a']++;
	if(equal(v1.begin(),v1.end(),v2.begin()))
	cout<<"YES"<<endl;
	else
	cout<<"NO"<<endl;
	
	}
	
return 0;
}
